channel.title: Projects on Andrew Kirrane's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Andrew Kirrane's Portfolio

item.title: GitHub Virtual Assistant with NLP
item.description: Click here to view the project in GitHub Project Overview Created a tool that can read questions and reply with answers from GitHub’s FAQ section Scraped examples of questions and answers using Beautiful Soup from GitHub Engineered new variations of questions through context and keywords in both the questions and answers Utilized a three layer linear Neural Network to build a model that could answer similar questions Built a client facing flask app and integrated it with a combination of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript Client Preview
